Docs.param: Name of the Azure service for which the problem classifications need to be retrieved.
The headers that will be added to request.
Docs.summary: Lists all the problem classifications (categories) available for a specific Azure service. Always use the service and problem classifications obtained programmatically. This practice ensures that you always have the most recent set of service and problem classification Ids.
